text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Uuuu……it's here it's here it's hereee! I've got a headache!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yessir! This is simply a side effect from my teacher's passionate instruction during supplementary lessons!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This is, shall we say, a muscle ache for the brain……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Sore muscles are a harbinger of growth…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In other words! I'm smart, and I'm about to get even smarter!
choice_data_list: S, so that's how it works…?
S, so that's how it works…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Affirmative! Based on my experience and theories, there is no doubt!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let's ride this wave of growth! Both physically and mentally, Bakushinbaku――
Despite her enthusiasm, Sakura Bakushin O was plagued by a headache.
